mapper.select: SELECT ga.g_num, ga.g_title, ga.g_pic, ga.g_text, to_char(ga.g_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') g_time, ga.m_id, ga.g_secret, ( SELECT COUNT(go.gg_good) FROM cy_gallery_good go WHERE go.g_num = ga.g_num AND go.gg_good = 1 ) AS good_count FROM cy_gallery ga WHERE ga.m_id = #{m_id} ORDER BY ga.g_num desc OFFSET #{startItem} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{itemsPerPage} ROWS ONLY

SELECT ga.g_num, ga.g_title, ga.g_pic, ga.g_text, to_char(ga.g_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') g_time, ga.m_id, ga.g_secret, ( SELECT COUNT(go.gg_good) FROM cy_gallery_good go WHERE go.g_num = ga.g_num AND go.gg_good = 1 ) AS good_count FROM cy_gallery ga WHERE ga.g_secret = 0 and ga.m_id = #{m_id} ORDER BY ga.g_num desc OFFSET #{startItem} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{itemsPerPage} ROWS ONLY
select m_id from cy_gallery_good where g_num = #{g_num} and m_id = #{m_id}
select m_id from cy_gallery_comment_good where gc_num = #{gc_num} and m_id = #{m_id}
select count(*) from cy_gallery where m_id = #{m_id}
select count(*) from cy_gallery where m_id = #{m_id} and g_secret = 0

SELECT m.m_id, co.gc_num, h.h_pic as g_pic, m.m_nick, TO_CHAR(co.gc_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS g_time, co.gc_text, ( SELECT COUNT(go.gcg_good) FROM cy_gallery_comment_good go WHERE go.gc_num = co.gc_num AND go.gcg_good = 1 ) AS good_count FROM cy_gallery_comment co JOIN cy_member m ON m.m_id = co.m_id JOIN cy_home h ON m.m_id = h.m_id WHERE co.g_num = #{g_num} ORDER BY good_count desc
select m_nick, h_pic as g_pic from cy_member m join cy_home h on m.m_id = h.m_id WHERE m.m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cy_gallery(g_title, g_pic, g_text, g_time, m_id, g_secret) VALUES (#{g_title}, #{g_pic}, #{g_text},systimestamp at time zone 'Asia/Seoul', #{m_id}, #{g_secret})

SELECT SEQ_cy_gallery_comment_gc_num.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO cy_gallery_comment(gc_num, gc_text, g_num, m_id, gc_time) VALUES(#{gc_num}, #{gc_text}, #{g_num}, #{m_id}, SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul')
